name: Neon Prism
description: Neon prism is a fun and simple but at the same time highly addictive game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel dual core 2.0 Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 700 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or 8 Processor: Intel dual core 2.4 Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 700 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This is challenging, this is neon, this is outstanding! Add dubstep/electro soundtracks and you get something what refreshes (or probably shatters) your brains. Spent approx 30mins to get used to the keypad controls, but I feel that this is one of the points. Still remember - challenge is the main point. Designers accomplished this, no doubt
